title: Predictive Analytics with Machine Learning

problem.description: Implementation of scalable ML pipelines for customer churn prediction, credit risk modeling, and time-series forecasting. Companies needed reliable predictive models for strategic decisions based on concrete data, not intuition.
painPoints: Inaccurate sales forecasts caused inventory inefficiencies
Datasets with missing values, outliers, and non-linear trends
Need to deploy models to production with monitoring

technical: Integration with legacy systems without modern APIs
Need for model interpretability for business stakeholders
compliance: GDPR for customer data in churn prediction

solution.architecture: End-to-end pipeline: data preprocessing with Pandas, custom feature engineering for domain, ensemble models (Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, LSTM for time-series). Deployment via Docker with FastAPI for inference. Model drift monitoring with metrics logging.
keyDecisions: Gradient Boosting (XGBoost) for churn prediction - better interpretability
LSTM networks for time-series with complex seasonal patterns
Manual feature engineering based on domain knowledge (not just AutoML)
Jupyter Notebooks for EDA shared with business stakeholders
Docker for portability and CI/CD deployment
solution.approach: Iterative approach: 1) In-depth EDA to discover data anomalies, 2) Simple baseline model as benchmark, 3) Feature engineering guided by business insights, 4) Hyperparameter tuning with cross-validation, 5) Incremental deployment with A/B testing.

metrics.label: Churn prediction accuracy
metrics.description: Gradient Boosting model with engineered features

metrics.label: Forecasting error reduction
metrics.description: LSTM model vs traditional ARIMA model

results.impact: Scalable predictive models providing actionable insights. Churn prediction enables targeted retention campaigns, forecasting optimizes inventory, credit risk model reduces financial exposure. All models documented and interpretable for business stakeholders.

role: End-to-end ML pipeline design (preprocessing, training, deployment)
Feature engineering and data preprocessing with Pandas/NumPy
Model selection and hyperparameter tuning (XGBoost, LSTM)

cta.text: Want ML models for your business?
